body.name: Intercleaner Corded Vacuum Cleaner, 15KPa Powerful Suction with 400W Motor, 12 in 1 Lightweight Bagless Stick Vac with Handheld, Ultra Quiet, for Hardwood Floor Carpet Car Pet Hair
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 42 mins
features: 【12 in 1 Multifunction】: Our lightweight vacuum cleaner equipped with 11 accessories that can be connected freely to adapt to the cleaning of any where. Dusting brush, all kinds of crevice nozzle, and extension wand efficiently and thoroughly clearing debris, dust, crumbs, reducing hair entanglement, it meets diverse cleaning needs for hard floors, such as wooden floors and marble, stairs, windowsills, beds, and sofas.
【Powerful Suction】: Latest update corded stick vacuum equipped with brushless motor provides up to 15KPa strong suction, which can quickly clean all kinds of floor and short-haired carpet.

【16.4ft Extra Long Cord】: 16.4 ft power cable can make small vacuum have a broad range of use. You don' need to change the plug-in position frequently as the cleaning place changed. It's much more convenient when compared to standard corded vacuum cleaners. Let you experience powerful suction as well as get rid of runtime constraints.

【Lightweight and Portable】: The carpet vacuum cleaner weights 3lb（wire not included）, it is good for women and the elderly to take it upstairs and downstairs at ease. Children can also use this little vacuum to participate in family household.

【Handheld Vacuum Mode】: After replacing the multifunction 4-in-1 brush, it can be quickly switched to a handheld vacuum cleaner which is very suitable for sofas, car, keyboards and gaps. Have one and you will never worry about the whole household cleaning!
【Large Capacity Dust Cup】:The portable vacuum cleaner for home comes with a 0.8L large-capacity dust cup. It can be used 5-7 times before needing to be emptied.

【Pro-Max Filtration System】:3 Layer filtration system, 2 extra washable and reusable HEPA can keep the suction strong and save your cost. Thus, it exhale ultimate purified air for your family and prevents secondary air pollution, completely say goodbye to dust inhalation.
【Pet Friendly】: Working quiet for pet hair that not only cleans up, but also benefits the pet's body and mind.

【One Button To Pour Dust】: The bagless stick vacuum cleaner has a high-capacity dust cup that handles long cleaning sessions empty the hand vac cleaner cup without getting your hands dirty with the one-button. Transparent dust cup can check the dust capacity and clean up in time. User friendly design creates a hassle-free best dust cleaner experience for you.

【1 Year Warranty】: Intercleaner handheld upright vacuum is a good helper for housewives, provide excellent performance at an economical price. Our provides a 1-year warranty and 7 x 24h customer service, no worries about after-sales problems!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Intercleaner 12 in 1 Lightweight Stick Upright Corded Vacuum Cleaner is a Perfect Gifts for Family ! Our multifunction vacuum cleaner can help you easily cleaning out different kinds of trash, such as pet hair, dusts, snack crumbs,coffee beans and cat litters. Specification: * Voltage: 120 V * Wire length: 16.4 ft (5 M) * Dirt cup: 0.18 gallons (0.8 L) * Dust Collection: Bagless * Color: Black & Blue

Powerful Suction and Lightweight Corded Stick Vacuum Cleaner Lightweight and Convenient 11 Accessories Multifunction Helps Whole House Cleaning Large Capacity Dust Collecting Cup High Effienciency Filtration System

Intercleaner Handheld Vacuum/Stick Vacuum Special Features: Self-standing for simple storage This Stick Vacuum Cleaner adapted ergonomic design and low center of gravity design, which makes cleaning more comfortable, it can stand up alone anywhere without leaning on the wall. Whenever you need to pause the ongoing cleaning just leave it there and click to stand up by itself. Convenient for Corners Cleaning The pet carpet cleaner machine can be used between 0°-90° to easily clean the bottom of sofa or bed. 11 accessories design makes cleaning under and around furniture a breeze. Pet Friendly Vacuum Cleaner Pets are our families, cats and dogs have sharper hearing than humans, our lightweight vacuum cleaner work quiet for pet hair. It not only cleans up, but also benefits the pet's body and mind. Extra-Long Cord & Easily Organized 16.4 ft power cable can make small vacuum have a broad range of use, The power cord can be wound to the back to save storage space. You don't need to change the plug-in position frequently as the cleaning place changed.Let you experience powerful suction as well as get rid of runtime constraints.

Extra-large Dustbin Capacity Are you tired of cleaning the dust cup frequently? The portable vacuum cleaner for home comes with a large-capacity 0.8L dust cup. It can be used 5-7 times before needing to be emptied. Suitable for cleaning kitchen, living room and bathroom messes. Washable HEPA Filter The removable HEPA filter can be easily cleaned and reusable. Note: The filter should be replaced every 2-3 months to improve the dust collection performance. NOTE: The black bulges need to be aligned with the grooves. Convert to Handheld Vacuum After replacing the multifunction 12-in-1 cleaning accessories, it can be quickly switched to a handheld vacuum cleaner which is very suitable for sofas, car, bed, keyboards and gaps. Whole home cleaning, any where and any time, Lightweight design helps you enjoy the cleaning ! 400W Powerful Motor This vacuum cleaner has a 400W powerful motor. The upgraded version provides powerful suction to meet cleaning demands and easily picks up debris and dust, crumbs, and pet hairs. This upright vacuum is especially suitable for hard floors.

11 Accessories : Different combinations for better whole house cleaning ! Brush Head x1 pcs Easily picks up pet hair, debris from carpet, hardwood floor, tile, car, stair, sofa, etc. Crevice Tools x3 pcs The compact design is more suitable for cleaning the corners of the room, such as windows, stairs, gap in sofa, etc. Brush Tools x3 pcs The brush design can easily cleaning surface dirty as well as removing dust, such as curtains, keyboards, vents, etc. Round Crevice Tools x5 pcs They can be connected to extend length that cleaning dust in high place and small corners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great vacuum, great price
reviews.reviewText: I have a Dyson cordless, and it is finicky when larger items (like bits of wood that fall on my floor when I put logs in the fireplace) get trapped in the tube. And because the Dyson has a beater bar, it is too vigorous for silk and wool carpets. So I was looking for a suction-only vacuum that would be suitable for wood chips as well as hand-woven carpets. This vacuum is the perfect solution. It got all the dirt up off the wool carpets, and it handily vacuumed up all of the small wood chips around my wood-burning stove. I used the narrow brush attachments to vacuum up stray bits of cold ash that has settled on the front of the stove, and it worked well.I debated about cordless or electric, and it was the price that convinced me to buy the electric. This is the lightest vacuum I have ever owned, so it goes up and down the stairs with no problem. I love that I can detach the handle (or just hold it low on the handle) and use it like a Dust Buster. Extremely versatile, enough suction power for my cleaning needs, and the many attachments will be useful for odd cleaning jobs, as well as the occasional cobweb.I would advise users to pay attention to the amount of dirt/dust that collects around the filter cup. After vacuuming one of my large carpets, I opened the top and cleaned off the collar of fine dust and debris that was clinging to the filter, so the vacuum would continue to get strong suction. It was very easy to do. The instructions mentioned something about not letting the motor get overheated, so I am vigilant about regular cleaning, just like with a Roomba.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and does the trick
reviews.reviewText: I have sciatica. There is something about vacuuming that just sets it off. I can sweep, I can mop, but I could not vacuum. Now I can vacuum again, and this little thing has surprisingly good suction. I will tell you that most of my floors are hard surfaces, but it works well on the carpet I do have. The filter is washable, but I found just using a dust broom to dust it out, works best. The attachments are nice, but they give you too many and they have to be stored somewhere. I purchased a small net laundry bag. It would have been nice if they provided a bag. So, my only complaint is that they give you too much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Beginner Vacuum
reviews.reviewText: Overall, I'm pretty impressed with this vacuum! The seller shipped it promptly, and it arrived 3 days earlier than expected! This vacuum has several strengths: it works extremely well on hard floor surfaces and upholstery. I have a cat that sheds all over, and my sofa is always covered in cat hair. I didn't even bother attaching one of the other vacuum brush heads, as it's so lightweight I just used the whole vacuum on the couch! And as you can see from the pictures, the vacuum got all the hair up! It has a surprisingly strong suction for such a small machine. The biggest downside that I noticed is that the vacuum isn't quite strong enough to be effective on carpet. I have a big area rug that it struggled to suck all the bits of lint and grime out of. In addition, the plastic it is made out of felt pretty cheap. It sort of reminded me of the toy vacuum I had as a kid... Yet because of its small size and light weight, I could get into every tiny corner of my apartment without a problem. It is highly maneuverable and came with plenty of different attachments depending on the type of cleaning you need to do. Overall, this is a great beginner vacuum and would work well in a small apartment or house with hard floors. That's exactly what I needed it for, and at this price, I think it was a good choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I got what I paid for
reviews.reviewText: Cheap is chea. The first time I used it the plastic broke around the hole where the handle goes in. Now the handle wobbles. The suction was good for the price but would not buy again nor recommend based on the cheap constriction of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have no complaints this vacuum was so worth itBest one I’ve had and it’s so convenient and portable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I would totally recommend this flooe vacuum, it sucks all the dirt really well, it says that it has for vacuum the carpets but I won't recommend that, only if you have a carpet that it's not that fuzzy! Other than that it works great and for the price it's more than enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful suction and easy to store
reviews.reviewText: I love this small handy , powerful vacuum cleaner. It is easy to assemble and easy to store. You can even vacuum in the smallest places where you normally can't reach because of the various hoses that comes with it. I love it. Great product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great if you need a budget portable vacuum for a small space
reviews.reviewText: It's lightweight, easy to move, and has pretty okay suctioning power. Is it perfect? No. It's cheap and you can feel that as you're using it. But it works as an affordable option when you only need it for a small space, such as a studio apartment, car, or even a bedroom.The instructions for putting the pieces together were a little unclear, but aside from that, my experience with the vacuum is great!
Buena aunque le falta un poco mas de fuerza para jalar bien los pelos de perro que se quedan pegados en mi caso la uso para aspirar mi sala y batalla mucho para quitarlos

This is an amazing little vacuum, it has fantastic suction,super surprised actually, you do have to empty multiple times,I have ,4 area rugs with two with two pets ,car and dog. It great for little clean ups, gets into smaller spaces and great for floors as well. Happy so far.
Esta aspiradora es muy ligera, fácil de usar y transportar, estoy satisfecha con la compra. Mi único comentario es que dice que es silenciosa y no lo es, mi gatita si se asusta con el ruido.
Sirve muy bien para lugares pequeños y no es de uso rudo, ya que a veces cuando la usas por mucho tiempo se calienta y ya no funciona hasta que se enfríe, pero cumple su función
Me gusto bastante la manera fácil de trabajar con ella, para todos los espacios
